name: Horror Labyrinth (theropoy)
description:
[Experimental Alpha] Horror Labyrinth is about finding your way out of zombie infested mazes. Starting with only a Gun and 10 Bullets you need to shoot your way out of it. Every defeated Zombie has a chance to drop Ammo and Health.

I started Horror Labyrinth as a fun project to learn Unity after some projects with Godot, but I really underrated the time cost of this project as a single indie dev. I'm open to ideas! In case you want to support my non existent budget I would be really happy.

Implemented Features:

  • Gun
  • Zombies
  • Little sound effects
  • Items you can Pick up
  • One unfinished Maze
  • Zombie Animation and Sounds
  • Ammunition System
  • Health System

Planned Features:

  • Different Zombies
  • Different Weapons
  • ?Story?
  • More Mazes
  • Better Controls 
  • Better Aesthetics
